attributes.action: Support the Creation of the most Brilliant Order of the Blubell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Call for the Creation of the most Brilliant Order of the Bluebell as a
National Award for efforts in protecting
and Promoting the Bluebell in the
United Kingdom.

Protection of Species in the UK should
be at the Heart of Government Policy
with all Due Seriousness and therefore
Efforts should be Rewarded

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
